title: Extra Mile Blessings | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Extra Mile Blessings | Joel Osteen
description:
When God asks you to go the extra mile, that’s a sign He has something amazing in your future. Every time you choose to obey, His unexpected favor will follow.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
